thread.title: Louisville says it is investigating claims that a staffer got escorts for basketball recruits
thread.title_full: Louisville says it is investigating claims that a staffer got escorts for basketball recruits

title: Louisville says it is investigating claims that a staffer got escorts for basketball recruits
text:
Louisville says it is investigating claims that a staffer got escorts for basketball recruits By   
LOUISVILLE, Ky. (AP) - Louisville says it is investigating claims that a staffer got escorts for basketball recruits.
